title: SOA Serial Analyzer
subtitle: Analyze Start of Authority (SOA) records to interpret serial number formats and examine DNS zone timing parameters. SOA records contain critical zone metadata including serial numbers for change tracking and timing values for zone transfers.

google.tooltip: Analyze SOA record for google.com (High-traffic domain with frequent updates)

github.description: Tech company with modern DNS management
github.tooltip: Analyze SOA record for github.com (Tech company with modern DNS management)

cloudflare.tooltip: Analyze SOA record for cloudflare.com (DNS provider with optimal configurations)

iana.tooltip: Analyze SOA record for iana.org (Internet standards organization)

rfcEditor.tooltip: Analyze SOA record for rfc-editor.org (Official RFC publication site)

example.tooltip: Analyze SOA record for example.com (Reserved example domain (RFC 2606))

form.title: SOA Analysis Configuration
form.domainTooltip: Enter a domain name to analyze its SOA record
form.resolverTooltip: Choose a DNS-over-HTTPS resolver for the query

results.title: SOA Analysis for {name}
results.resolverTooltip: DNS-over-HTTPS resolver used for the query

refresh.title: Refresh
refresh.description: How often secondary servers check for updates

retry.title: Retry
retry.description: Retry interval after failed refresh attempts

expire.title: Expire
expire.description: When secondary servers stop serving the zone

tips.validDomain: Ensure the domain name is valid and has a SOA record
tips.tryDifferent: Try a different DoH resolver if the current one fails
tips.someResolvers: Some domains may not respond to certain resolvers
tips.checkDomain: Check if the domain exists and is properly configured

education.title: About SOA Records and Serial Numbers

whatIsSOA.title: What is a SOA Record?
whatIsSOA.description: Start of Authority records contain administrative information about a DNS zone, including the primary server, contact email, and timing parameters that control zone transfers and caching behavior.

timingParams.title: Timing Parameters
timingParams.refresh: Refresh: How often secondaries check for updates
timingParams.retry: Retry: Retry interval after failed transfers
timingParams.expire: Expire: When to stop serving if updates fail

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
bestPractices.useYYYYMMDDNN: Use YYYYMMDDNN format for predictable versioning
bestPractices.setRefresh: Set refresh to 3600-7200s for most zones
bestPractices.retryShorter: Retry should be shorter than refresh (1800-3600s)
